headline: Record Wins for Linde’s Small On-Site Solutions in 2024 Driven by Electronics and Decarbonization
summary: Linde (Nasdaq:LIN) announced today that for the fifth successive year, it secured a record number of new small on-site projects for the supply of nitrogen and oxygen. During 2024, the company signed 59 new long-term agreements for which it will build, ...

headline: Linde: record 59 long-term agreements signed in 2024
summary: Linde reports that it has signed 59 new long-term agreements in 2024 for the construction and operation of 64 on-site nitrogen and oxygen production units. According to the company, this is a record...
